channel.title: Having a hard time please help
channel.description: I bought a domain the other day (Runeiverse.net) I looked at the tuts for having a server, i have the No-IP DUC thing working but its to runeiverse.no-ip.org how can i change that? and how can i add forums to my website w/o doing all of that hard PHP code? for now i just want a simple forum, and a DL ling to my RSPS. can someone help? also i portforwarded but how can i verify that it worked?

item.title: Having a hard time please help
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Anc13ntsIsBack, post:4, topic:404846”][quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=501852.msg3672135#msg3672135 date=1311006612]
Not sure why my post was deleted. I asked for his IP and port since he asked us how to verify.
[/quote]
I thought the same thing at first, but he posted two topics exactly the same. One in the help section, on in the Dev section[/quote]What a sneaky guy.

Read full topic
item.source: Having a hard time please help

item.title: Having a hard time please help
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

This is Runescape Classic.
IF this is Rs2, Leave & Don’t read below.

You bought a domain, where’s the webhost?
You need a webhost to upload your forums. You can use phpbb, fluxbb, vbulletin, smf, ipb, and so on.

Read full topic
